OverdueBody:
Good day to you
Kindly find the attached statement of account and invoice.

According to our payment term with your company, your are requested to make the payment within {Days} after you receive the monthly statement of account. Please clear and remit, if any. If you have made the payment, please let me know and I will update accordingly

Bearing in mind, as company policy

ATP shall be entitled, at its absolute discretion, to suspend Customer's account and hold service call until overdue outstanding has been fully paid.

Thank you
